apple_vendor_description: This joyful emoji, as seen on Apple devices, showcases a couple with their arms around each other, a vibrant heart floating between them, all rendered with Apple's signature polished 3D effect and soft, rounded forms. The medium-light and light skin tones are depicted with realistic lighting, highlighting Apple's inclusive design philosophy. The prominent, luminous heart, a key element on Apple devices, powerfully symbolizes love, unity, and a strong bond between two people.
